thread.title: Kushner Cos. Has ‘Handshake’ Deal With Vornado for New York Office Tower

author: Peter Grant
title: Kushner Cos. Has ‘Handshake’ Deal With Vornado for New York Office Tower

organizations.name: vornado for new york office tower kushner cos.

text:
Kushner Cos. has reached a “handshake” deal to buy the 49.5% stake in the office tower at 666 Fifth Ave. in Manhattan that it doesn’t already own from its partner Vornado Realty Trust, according to a regulatory filing Friday by Vornado.
Terms of the deal weren’t disclosed. The financially ailing 39-story tower has been at the center of a controversy over possible conflicts between President Donald Trump’s senior adviser and son-in-law Jared Kushner and the family real-estate business he left to work at the White House.
...
